subtitles:
51054 54224 SARAH: People once believed
that when someone dies,

54307 57978 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

62107 66611 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it, and the soul can't rest.

70532 74911 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

98018 101813 -OFFICER: I got one here.
-(RADIO CHATTER CONTINUES)

101896 104816 -(EXHALES)
-Sir, this is all we got checked on.

134763 137891 OFFICER: Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?
145649 147776 All right, guys. Let's do it.

147859 151237 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?
152739 154532 They're slacking off from last year.

154616 157410 Three hours to go.
Maybe they're just slow starters.

164542 166854 but you guys just can't come in here
and take her away like this.

166878 170757 There are procedures to stick by. You guys
should have cleared this with me first.

171508 173843 -Is this the victim?
-No, it's Amelia Earhart.

173927 175607 We found her, Detective,
and you missed it.

175637 178807 I don't care what her name is.
I didn't give the order to move her.

179724 182227 Jesus, Albrecht. I can see why
they took away your gold shield.

182310 184521 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.

186356 188316 -(CAWS)
-DETECTIVE: All right. Clear out of here.

194364 197325 -SHELLY: Where's Eric?
-Just don't worry about him.
199619 201579 Tell him to take care of Sarah.

201663 204999 Look, I will. You just lie back.
Come on. Come on.

217637 221683 Yeah, look.
Your sister, she's gonna be okay.

221766 226062 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
232110 233945 You lied to her about Eric.
236364 238324 And you're lying to me about Shelly.

257135 259929 -OFFICER: Get public service in here.
-She's gonna be fine.

283536 285789 I used to think
that was true about everything.

290502 294380 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real,

294464 298927 two people who are meant to be together--
nothing can keep them apart.
337257 339133 What are you, like, the night watchman?

361781 367078 You know, what this place needs
is a good, natural catastrophe.
370623 373042 No, no. Mickey, come on, man.

373126 375086 You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
375169 377463 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
377547 379465 Hey, hey, come on. Let me do it.

384804 388016 Come on. Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me. Lots of onions.

398526 400695 How do you steer that thing
on a wet street?

402947 406367 See, now, Sarah,
she's a genuine hotdogger. You hungry?

422133 424719 GANG MEMBER: You know,
Lake Erie actually caught on fire once
424802 426971 from all the crap floating around in it.
427639 430892 (EXHALES) I wish I could have seen that.
536372 539208 Fire it up! We busted them machines.
563274 566652 Oh, shit, guys. T-Bird. Cop car. Cop car.
574368 576496 Bad people out on the street tonight.
586881 588758 ALBRECHT: Mickey, call it in for me!

701037 706626 "Abashed the Devil stood
and felt how awful goodness is.
706709 710046 Saw virtue in her shape, how lover--"

724602 726687 -No, no, no, no. Me first.
-(SHELLY WHIMPERING)

781492 784245 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

788874 792962 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

796966 798968 You need to go over there
and talk to your pals.

802930 805891 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?
822366 824577 That shit ain't even loaded, man.

827538 833627 Which of you Motor City motherfuckers
wants to bet me this one isn't?

848142 850227 -Put your guns away, huh, guys?
-How you doing?
963215 966010 ♪ "Oh, it doesn't matter how you hide" ♪

971307 973809 ♪ "So slide back down
And close your eyes" ♪
1013557 1015809 TIN TIN: Couple more rings. That's 24K.
1017228 1020439 It's 18K. It's crap. It's probably fake.

1026195 1028948 What is this, Tin Tin?
A bloodstain that's on here?

1031992 1034620 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.
1034703 1036914 Now, you can take it or leave it.
1053222 1054723 Close the gate when you go out!

1054807 1057935 Oh, I close this up for you
real good, mass a.
1061730 1064066 Yeah, sit on it and twirl, you dirty scum.

1068779 1071198 TIN TIN: You're lucky
I don't stab your fat ass.
1094013 1098267 ♪ That point me to another day ♪

1177721 1181392 What the fuck you all painted up for,
crackhead. Huh? (CHUCKLES)

1233736 1236613 I didn't murder nobody, man.
I don't even fucking know you, man.
1236697 1238115 What the fuck you want, man?
1238198 1240492 I want you to tell me a story.
1240576 1242786 A man and a woman in a loft a year ago.

1246582 1251545 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them on Halloween.
1253839 1256049 Some dude, some bitch-- Whatever, man.
1259219 1262014 You cut her. You raped her.
1263766 1267269 I shanked her pink ass, and she loved it!
1278655 1281033 Murder? Let me tell you about murder.
1284203 1286955 You gonna learn all about it.
1291627 1294213 I'd like you to meet two buddies of mine.
1330541 1335879 ♪ Sometimes it rains inside my head ♪

1344304 1347349 Look at this mess.
What's the world coming to?
1353814 1356483 ♪ No, they don't have to take you... ♪

1356567 1358735 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.
1358819 1363407 ♪ No, they don't have to take you away ♪
1363490 1365993 Get out of my way, you worms!
1366076 1368370 ♪ No, they don't have to take you away ♪
1368453 1369872 Give me some of that over there.

1372249 1374751 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.
1377546 1380632 Arcade Games fell down, went boom.
1381800 1384553 Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1385429 1389391 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1389474 1392144 -Is the man in?
-He's taking a meeting.

1435812 1439733 He said, "Childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die."
1478355 1484486 ♪ No, they don't have to take you away ♪

1490325 1493286 DRIVER: Hey, kid,
get the hell out of the road!
1499793 1504506 ♪ I don't hate them, but I know them ♪
1504589 1509511 ♪ I don't want them hanging around ♪
1509594 1512806 ♪ I won't roll my bones for every... ♪
1516101 1518270 I told you to stay out of here.

1518353 1522149 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1524067 1526236 Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

1532159 1535162 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1535245 1540667 ♪ I thought I had no choice
But then I kissed her ♪

1540751 1543462 MOCKING: "Somebody already
bought me dinner. The police."
1559561 1561980 Who the fuck is this now?

1569029 1572866 Go sleep it off somewhere else, dust head,
unless you want to get mutilated.
1577496 1579623 I'm gonna blow this guy's dick off.

1580832 1583710 Goddamn creatures of the night.
They never learn.

1595806 1599768 as if someone gently rapping--
rapping at my chamber door."
1602187 1604106 What the fuck are you talking about?
1609986 1612030 and you owe me a fucking new door!

1614449 1617452 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.
1630757 1633301 Shit on me. Shit on me!
1640392 1642686 Mr. Gideon, you're not paying attention.
1650610 1654739 I repeat: A gold engagement ring, yes?

1655615 1659578 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1663373 1665917 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1671006 1672966 So who's this sack of shit?

1673049 1676303 That's Tin Tin,
one of T-Bird's little helpers.
1676386 1678805 I think you can rule out accidental death.

1678889 1682309 (CHUCKLES) Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?
1682392 1684144 This could be a turf hit,

1684227 1686313 but it doesn't look like
your usual gang crap.
1688273 1691359 You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.
1691443 1693361 I'm supposed to thank you for that, right?

1693987 1697199 Word to the wise:
Watch your fucking mouth.
1698408 1700202 What the hell do you call that?
1704539 1707792 I suppose you'll write it up as graffiti.
1707876 1711129 You can leave my crime scene now, okay?

1720889 1723516 -Don't you know this game?
-What game are you talking about?

1724100 1726478 All right, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1726561 1729606 They're in that metal box.
It's under the shelf there.
1731399 1733401 Take them. Take the fucking rings!

1733485 1736738 You can chew them and you can
choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1740158 1742744 -Look, it goes up to the attic.
-Okay.
1761346 1763640 It's beautiful. I don't believe it.

1787706 1790625 -You have one chance to live.
-Look, man, take anything you want.

1795088 1798925 Now you're gonna tell me where to find
the rest of Tin Tin's little party pals.
1799009 1800927 The Pit. They all hang out at The Pit.

1801011 1803722 All of T-Bird's little potato heads
hang out there.

1803805 1806057 Funboy, he lives there, upstairs,
all right?

1820739 1824617 -Each one of these is a life.
-(RINGS CLATTERING)
1827287 1829873 I'm begging you, all right. Don't kill me.

1833710 1837881 Your job will be to tell the rest of them
that death is coming for them.
1846473 1848975 Tell them Eric Draven sends his regards.

1852562 1856149 You walk out of here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass!

1856733 1858568 You're nothing but street grease,
you hear?

1884386 1887514 -(JUKEBOX POWERS UP)
-On the house, kiddo. You know that.

1895522 1899984 Your mom, technically,
she's off right now.

1912747 1914791 I thought the police always said,
"Freeze."

1914874 1917544 Well, I am the police,
and I say don't move, Snow White.
1920213 1924050 And I say I'm dead and I move.
1924717 1927429 Not one more step. I'm serious.
1927512 1931850 Then shoot, if you will, Officer Albrecht.
1931933 1935061 What are you, nuts? Walking into a gun?

1940108 1944195 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1946906 1948825 I want you to move over to the curb there.
1948908 1950535 Come on, real nice and easy.
1954497 1956040 We're gonna wait here for backup.
1956958 1958877 It's getting too frigging weird for me.

1959669 1963465 Oh, it gets better.
Do you know someone named T-Bird?

1963548 1966384 He had a friend
who shouldn't have played with knives.
1968303 1969888 You're the guy that murdered Tin Tin.

1975643 1978146 He died a year ago,
the moment he touched her.

1980482 1983651 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

1986237 1988781 -THIEF 1: Cops!
-THIEF 2: Come on. Get out of here!

1989282 1991993 -(THIEF 3 LAUGHS)
-THIEF 4: Leave it. Leave it. Run!

2002170 2004088 Guy shows up
looking like a mime from hell,
2004172 2007091 and you lose him right out in the open.

2009219 2012430 at least he didn't do
that walking-against-the-wind shit.
2013598 2015238 OFFICER: Little early for Devil's Night.
2015975 2017519 What the hell is going on here?

2021606 2024859 I just wish I was a little hungry again,
that's all.

2024943 2028655 -Be careful what you ask for.
-Yeah, you may get it. I know.
2040833 2043920 There are energies aligning against you.

2065525 2069487 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.
2069571 2072073 Nobody cleared this little event with me.

2072156 2076619 -I didn't have nothing to do with that.
-I'm sure you must be awful disappointed.

2076703 2080873 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

2080957 2083251 -Yeah? And who might that be?
-Tin Tin.

2083334 2087880 Somebody stuck his blades in all
his major organs in alphabetical order.

2089591 2093428 I think we ought to have an introspective
moment of silence for poor old Tin Tin.

2095888 2099017 (SIGHS) You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?
2099100 2101894 Whatever you say, I can do.

2104063 2107609 I still ain't heard the story
on why Gideon's burned down.

2108818 2113072 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2113156 2115325 (SNIFFS) Call it my need to know.
2163790 2166000 He was a butt face. I could have made it.

2168169 2170713 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?
2175385 2177637 It's more like surfing than skating.
2177720 2179764 I wish the rain would stop, just once.
2180848 2182809 It can't rain all the time.
2205039 2206416 Are we fighting the good fight?

2206499 2210211 (SIGHS) Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

2215341 2219470 "We, the undersigned tenants
of 1929 Caulderon Court apartments--"

2220847 2223725 A big kick-me sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause,
2223808 2225268 and a cause that got her killed.

2225351 2227895 She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2227979 2233109 {\an8}Shelly Webster and her
nice rock-and-roll boyfriend Eric Draven.

2233192 2235778 {\an8}You know, the last time
you went snooping around on a case

2235862 2238531 -is when you got put back on the beat.
-Yeah, I know.

2238614 2241576 -Torres keeps reminding me.
-(CHUCKLES) I bet he does.

2249542 2252295 You're gonna wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2253546 2256007 -I'm cool.
-You didn't get that file from me, okay?
2256090 2258676 And don't tell me you owe me one.

2291667 2295379 Tomorrow night... (GASPS)
...we can-- we can get high

2295463 2299300 and watch this whole fucking city burn
from that window.

2323449 2326786 (CHUCKLES)
There's a big fucking bird over there.
2354021 2356023 ♪ Streets of gold, streets of gold ♪
2366742 2368911 You nearly gave me a fucking heart attack!

2375877 2379547 It's time for you to take your bird
and leave, freako.
2397732 2399233 Did you look in the mirror?
2399317 2402403 I mean, you need professional help.

2422798 2426552 "Jesus Christ."
Stop me if you heard this one.
2426636 2428888 Jesus Christ walks into a hotel.

2434477 2437730 He hands the innkeeper three nails
and he asks--
2441442 2443235 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2455998 2459794 (STRAINED VOICE)
Look what you've done to my sheets.
2484318 2486278 I've got a gun in my pocket.
2489156 2490950 You're happy to see me, aren't you?
2509760 2513681 Stay away! Stay away from me! (SOBS)

2525359 2529905 "Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children."

2546338 2549633 Your daughter is out there on the streets
waiting for you.

2582041 2584168 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2587630 2590216 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2603395 2605481 You burn yourself playing with matches?
2610778 2613697 This is a first. Do I bow or do I curtsy?
2614281 2616075 Get my friend here a glass of blood.

and East Washington Place,

across the street from me

2686103 2688939 The fire that was won
by seven fire companies,
2689023 2690941 but lost the lives of two firefighters.

2691025 2694069 In fact, if it weren't for
the constant surveillance
2698699 2701035 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

2708626 2712296 I saw your body, man.
You-- You died. You got buried.
2713380 2714632 You still have your hat on.
2730439 2734777 are you some kind of... a ghost?
2744411 2746330 I don't know what I am.
2746413 2748958 I need you to tell me what happened to us.

2750834 2754296 Well, you took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2755047 2758217 She, uh, was beaten and raped.
2762972 2764682 I mean, come on. Read the file.

2765432 2770020 Shelly Webster held on for 30 hours
in intensive care,
2770104 2772481 and her body finally just gave it up.
2773190 2775859 I saw it, man. I couldn't do jack for her.
2801593 2803679 I saw her through your eyes.
2804972 2806724 You stayed with her the whole time.

2806807 2811603 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2812730 2817026 I was-- I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2817109 2820571 -Give me something I could work with.
-(LIGHTER CLICKS)
2825451 2827953 Why didn't you do something about it?

2828037 2829877 You think any of those people
in that building,

2829955 2833167 even the ones who signed the petition,
would talk after what happened to you?

2838047 2840924 and finally got busted for
sticking my nose where it wasn't wanted.

2856231 2859985 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.
2860069 2862404 I used to think they were kind of trivial.
2886053 2888972 Are you gonna vanish into thin air again?
2893018 2895312 I thought I'd use your front door.

2901360 2904196 I'm sorry as hell for what happened
to you and your girlfriend.

2916208 2919169 GIDEON: I got stabbed.
I shot the son of a bitch.
2919253 2921505 I watched the bullet hole close by itself.

2921588 2924425 And then I heard that my business
gets blown up real good.
2928303 2931056 I saw him too. He had a guitar.

2931140 2935561 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2942109 2945189 So far I haven't heard shit about what
you're going to do about all this crap.
2945237 2946738 I mean, what do I get?

2946822 2950159 My livelihood,
it got flushed away and went swirling.

2954288 2957624 Yeah, and maybe
you're not such a big shot either!

2966175 2969094 Say hello to the last fella
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2969178 2971114 What, are you telling me--
you're telling me this thing is real?

2971138 2974641 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2974725 2977728 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2978979 2982441 You know, you're directly
out of your fucking mind! You know that?

2988155 2991116 It's one of the most important things
I learned from my sister.

2991200 2993952 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister? (LAUGHS)

2997789 2999709 What's the matter?
You don't see the resemblance?

3001502 3005589 Now, let's take it from the top, friend.
And a lot of detail, huh?

3007049 3010469 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

3010552 3014097 He told me to tell T-Bird
that death was on its way.
3014181 3016391 Whatever the fuck that means. And--
3017142 3020229 Draven. He said his name was Eric Draven.
3021271 3022773 Want to relax that thing now?

3023482 3026818 And this bird man--
He just happened to let you live, huh?

3028237 3031740 You sure you ain't making all of this up
just to save your own ass?
3032533 3034660 I ain't making all this up.
3035369 3038580 I ain't twisted like you two fucks.
3063814 3065691 Oh, for fuck's sake, die, will you?
3075576 3077828 Funboy said he saw a black bird too.
3080914 3083166 Then he choked to death on his own blood.
3084835 3087546 I'll have the janitor come on up.

3183558 3185518 You know how long it took us
to put this together.

3187396 3189231 made Tin Tin into a fucking voodoo doll!

3194528 3196488 BOTH: Fire it up! Fire it up!
3196571 3198740 Fire it up! Fire it up!
3206331 3209376 Probably still banging away on Darla.
3214756 3217426 Smokes and road beers. Be quick.
3250917 3254171 What the fuck are you supposed to be, man?

3282449 3285702 Oh, shit!
What the fuck's the matter with you?

3296755 3301176 What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? I got it.
3302803 3305680 We could use you. You did Tin Tin.
3311812 3313647 OFFICER: You got that cream stuff?

3316066 3318485 I hate this.
You can't even call it cream legally.
3326034 3329246 Oh, look. You're making us popular.

3329329 3332123 When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

3337712 3340715 This is vehicle 48.
We got us a big, old, red hot rod.

3346721 3351977 You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out, right? Huh?
3369119 3370745 Oh, my God! Get out of the way!
3399983 3403695 Oh, I hate this. This ain't good.
3405113 3407532 T-Bird! I got you, man. I'm coming.

3424507 3426968 Remember? Yeah, I remember everything.
But I don't know--

3429638 3433099 What? What are you talking about?
No, no, no, no.

3436353 3438273 We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

3438355 3441650 She wasn't going along with
our tenant relocation program.

3441733 3445236 And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear

3445320 3447572 -into a total cluster fuck!
-(CAR TRUNK CLOSES)
3447656 3450533 Who gives a shit? It's ancient history.
3452494 3456039 What is it? What? Speak to me. Speak!
3458708 3460585 Did you send us these complaints?

3471137 3474808 I know you. I knew I knew you.
I knew I knew you.

3477519 3479896 You can't be you.
We put you through the window.

3481982 3485110 This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

3485193 3487529 We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

3491658 3495120 There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!
3505505 3507966 and felt how awful goodness is.

3578244 3580538 REPORTER: This is the 7:00 am. edition
of Action News.

3580622 3583124 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween

3583208 3587378 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, "Devil's Night--"

3587462 3590924 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

3598056 3601684 of what may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever,

3601768 3605271 the mayor has firefighters
from all surrounding counties...

3605355 3609150 Do you like them up or over?
I can't remember.

3611194 3613988 {\an8}What are you doing?
I don't even like eggs.

3619369 3622205 So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

3623206 3626126 So what did you take
to become mother of the year?
3629546 3631714 Someone kind of woke me up.

3638555 3642225 You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?
3647605 3649649 I never was too good at this mommy shit.
3654279 3658158 I like them over easy... Mom.

3674883 3677510 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

3677594 3680597 We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.
3680680 3682849 We're gonna have to ID his teeth.

3686311 3688438 Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

3701826 3704871 I got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right,
3704954 3706394 and you're covering up for somebody.

3708041 3710418 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

3710501 3713171 Hey, you're the detective.
Why don't you tell me?

3713254 3716674 Okay. Gideon's blows all to hell, and
you're having a chitchat with some weirdo

3716758 3719552 who winds up in T-Bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

3719636 3722013 Then you steal one of my case files
from homicide,

3722096 3724599 and you're saying this is just
a fucking automobile accident?

3727227 3729107 I didn't want to interrupt you.
It sounded good.
3729145 3730647 You gotta write that shit down.

3733816 3736236 The captain's got
a little love note waiting for you.

3736319 3738947 Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
3798923 3801551 SHELLY: One for sorrow, two for joy.

3801634 3804387 -Come here.
-Three for a girl and four for a boy.
3902652 3905446 You said, "Can't rain all the time."
3906406 3908199 That is from your song, right?

3919961 3922672 -(CAWING)
-Come on, Eric. I know you're here.
3932682 3934767 I get so lonely all by myself.
3938604 3941649 To hell with you. I thought you cared.

3960126 3962366 He was all painted up white
like some kind of dead whore.

3962420 3965590 I seen him. T-Bird, he sent me in
for some road beers, right?

3965673 3968092 Then he took him away.
But I chased him down.

3968176 3971095 And he flash-fried T-Bird
to his fucking car!
3971179 3974557 Oh, T-Bird! Here's to you, buddy.

3974640 3978603 Maybe we ought to just videotape this,
play it back in slow motion.
3980146 3982773 Fire it up! Fire it up!

3993618 3996204 He's working his way back
